comment.body: Looks closed source. Also anything which depends on proof of work is probably not viable for me. I want to conserve electrons and not waste them.
Nice, although I stopped reading HN a while back once it became unusable with a Tor browser. I should not need to "prove I am legit", or whatever nonsense they believe in.
That's a nice looking blog. I'll be setting up a ZeroNet blog some time soon, and might try to do something similar.
Would be nice to have some commandline interface to ZeroNet
Is Twitter failing? It still seems quite popular.
Yes. But keep in mind that there may be secret information sharing agreements with other countries, so any server you don't physically control is potentially compromised.
